title: Please HELP: I only need 5 Cards for my T206 Set
author: chris

posts.post_title: Please HELP: I only need 5 Cards for my T206 Set
posts.post_content:
Hello - Thank you all for your help so far. I am down to 5 cards I need to complete the set minus the big guys. If you have any of the cards listed below please contact me. Any condition, poor to mid grade, there is no card too Poor. I will trade also. Please email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]. Thanks

(202) J.R. Helm
235 Dutch Jordan Atlanta
(362) William Otey
(414) Admiral Schlei (batting)
(448) Jake Stahl (no glove shows)
